OurStoryDescription: With over 15 years of rich professional experience, I have acquired diverse and valuable skills in various fields:
• 4 years in retail at Super U and Mondovélo, where I developed a sharp sense of customer service and management.
• 6 years in the army as a combat team leader with the Alpine Hunters, where I learned discipline, leadership, and team management.
• 4 years at Cadiou, specialized in the manufacturing and powder coating of gates, including one year as a team leader, where I honed my skills in production management and leadership.
• 1 season as a self-employed entrepreneur, offering concierge and multi-service solutions, where I adapted to the varied needs of my clients.
These experiences have allowed me to develop essential qualities such as punctuality, perfectionism, respect, honesty, organization, availability, adaptability, and management.

Passionate about this beautiful region, I would be delighted to share my advice to ensure travelers have an unforgettable stay in the houses we manage. Residing in Saint-Nic, I am at the heart of the action to provide quality service.
At CMD BREIZH, we believe in mutual trust and respect with our property owners. Our services are designed to save you time and to take care of your homes with the utmost attention.
EcoFriendlyCommitmentDescription: We are committed to using as much as possible environmentally friendly cleaning products and sustainable practices to minimize our ecological footprint while delivering exceptional service.
EcoFriendlyCommitmentDescription2: By choosing CMD Breizh, you are able to guarantee the protection of the environment and respect the environmental standards.
CleaningDescription: Professional cleaning services for a property that's always spotless.
GardeningDescription: Gardening skills to keep your outdoor spaces beautiful and appealing.
CheckInOutDescription: Caring welcomes for new arrivals and meticulous check-out management with detailed inventories.
ClothesHandlingDescription: Fast and efficient laundry for a clean and welcoming home.
WelcomeBasketDescription: A welcome basket with a selection of local products is offered to each arriving guest.
MultiServiceDescription: Small repairs, troubleshooting, phone assistance, support with professionals ...

GDPRIntroduction: At CMD Breizh, we take privacy seriously and handle your personal data with the utmost care, in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
GDPRDataCollectionText: We only collect the personal information necessary to provide our services, including name, email address, and contact details. Thus, we do not collect any information related to browsing on our website, nor do we use any cookies or similar tracking technologies.
GDPRContactText: For any questions regarding GDPR or to exercise your rights, contact us at ${email}
GDPRPublisherContent: Registered with the RCS of ${RCSCity} under number ${SIREN}
GDPRHostingContent: Headquarters address: 650 California St, San Francisco, CA 94108
GDPRTermsContent: The site is accessible via the secure URL ${url}

Its use is governed by these general terms. By using the site, you acknowledge that you have read these terms and have accepted them. These terms may be modified at any time and without notice by the company ${shortName}.
The company ${shortName} cannot be held liable in any way for misuse of the service.
GDPRLiabilityContent: The information on this site is as accurate as possible, and the site is periodically updated, but may still contain inaccuracies, omissions, or gaps. If you notice an error or what might be a malfunction, please report it by email, describing the problem as precisely as possible.

Any content downloaded is at the user's own risk and under their sole responsibility. Consequently, the company ${shortName} cannot be held liable for any damage suffered by the user's computer or any data loss resulting from downloading. Photos are non-contractual.
Hyperlinks placed on this website to other websites do not engage the responsibility of the company ${shortName}.
GDPRDisputesContent: These terms are governed by French law, and any dispute or litigation that may arise from the interpretation or execution of these terms will be under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts where the company ${shortName}'s headquarters is located. The reference language for settling any disputes is French.
GDPRDataRights: 6. Right to Access, Rectify, and Erase Your Data
GDPRDataRightsContent: Under the Data Protection Act, internet users have a right to access, rectify, modify, and delete the data concerning them.

• Right of access: they can exercise their right to know personal data concerning them by writing to the following email address. In this case, before implementing this right, the Platform may request proof of the user's identity to verify its accuracy.
• Right of rectification: if the personal data held by the Platform is inaccurate, they can request an update of the information.
• Right to erase data: users can request the deletion of their personal data, in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
This right can be exercised by post to ${shortName}, ${address} or by email to the following address: ${email}

The personal information collected is confidential and is never transmitted to third parties except for the possible proper execution of the service ordered by the user. Under Law No. 2000-719 of August 1, 2000, the contact details declared by the buyer may be communicated upon judicial requisition.
GDPRDataCollectionContent: Personal data refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (data subject); an identifiable person is one who can be identified, directly or indirectly, particularly by reference to a name, an identification number, or one or more factors specific to their physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural, or social identity.
The personal information that may be collected on the site is mainly used by the publisher for managing relations with you.
The personal data collected in contact forms are as follows:

To process your request, ${shortName} will need to process your personal data. The data is kept for two (2) years from our last contact and is intended exclusively for ${shortName}; it will not be transferred to third parties.

GDPRNoTrackingContent: A "cookie" or tracker is an electronic file deposited on a terminal (computer, tablet, smartphone, etc.) and read, for example, when visiting a website, reading an email, installing or using software or a mobile application, regardless of the type of terminal used (source: https://www.cnil.fr/fr/cookies-traceurs-que-dit-la-loi).
At CMD, we do not track users and do not use any cookies whatsoever.
No personal data is collected without your explicit consent.
GDPRTechnicalContent: Technical services are provided by ${creatorName}, ${creatorStatus} registered under SIREN number ${creatorSIREN}.
